_description.iso_639_3_eng:
This *namespace* groups into a navigable *tree* all *container terms* of the *dictionary*. It represents a *table of contents* into all *controlled vocabularies*, *types* and *descriptors*.

The tree uses the [section-of](_predicate_section-of) predicate and the [path](_path) is the *namespace term*, when relevant, the tree also uses the specialised table of contents namespace specifically for *controlled vocabularies*, *types* and *descriptors*. The tree is not exhaustive, it stops at the *controlled vocabulary root*, the *type root* and at a *category term* for *descriptors*.
This *namespace* groups into a navigable *tree* all *controlled vocabularies*. The tree leaf will be the enumeration root and all predicates will be the [section-of](_predicate_section-of) predicate.
This *namespace* groups into a navigable *tree* all *object types*. The tree leaf will be the object root and all predicates will be the [section-of](_predicate_section-of) predicate.
This *namespace* groups into a navigable *tree* all *descriptors*. The tree leaf will be the *descriptor* and all predicates will be the [section-of](_predicate_section-of) predicate.
This *namespace* is a *group* for all *dictionary* *types* and *descriptors*.
